Context.statement: Context: SI-7[1]: Assignment: Information = Patient data
Context: MAS SI-7[2]: Assignment: Changed Information = {Patient ID, Medical record
Context: DS SI-7[2]: Assignment: Changed Information = {Drug Dose}
Context: AS SI-7[2]: Assignment: Changed Information = {Alarm}

MainGoal.control_action: monitors and analyzes events to detect potential attacks, anomalies and unauthorized connections
MainGoal.statement: Goal: SI-4 SI-4 Main: Information system monitors and analyzes events to detect potential attacks, anomalies and unauthorized connections; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(events),val(analysisResult)]; aw = 1

MainGoal.control_action: employs integrity verification tools to detect unauthorized changes to the information
MainGoal.statement: Goal: SI-7 SI-7 Main: Information system employs integrity verification tools to detect unauthorized changes to the information; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(Information),val(action),sat(integrityStatus)]; aw = 1

MainGoal.control_action: enforces approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information within the system and between connected systems
MainGoal.statement: Goal: AC-4 AC-4 Main: Information system enforces approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information within the system and between connected systems; Impact = high, Provides= [ sat(authorizationStatus)]; aw = 1

ReqGoal.functional_requirement: Any changes to information must be verified
ReqGoal.statement: Goal: SI-7 Req1: services' Integrity Verification capability maintains Any changes to information must be verified; aw = 1

ModuleGoal.statement: Module: DS SI-7 Goal : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of Drug services' Integrity Verification capability; aw = 1
Module: AS SI-7 Goal : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of Alarm services' Integrity Verification capability; aw = 1

ModuleGoal.assessment_process: Medical Analysis services' Integrity Verification capability
ModuleGoal.statement: Module: MAS SI-7 Goal : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of Medical Analysis services' Integrity Verification capability; aw = 1

Strategy.assessment_Process: services' confidence on Integrity Verification capability
Strategy.statement: Strategy: S1 : Argument over services' confidence on Integrity Verification capability
